data.value:
Results

You can find below your strength pre-order a relevant order for you

Choose the 3 that resonates the most with you, these 3 will most likely be at the top of the list but don't hesitate to check all the strength below to choose the ones that resonate the most with you

items.label: Appreciation of Beauty & Excellence
items.sub_label: Noticing and appreciating beauty, excellence, and/or skilled performance in various domains of life, from nature to art to mathematics to science to everyday experience.

items.label: Bravery
items.sub_label: Not shrinking from threat, challenge, difficulty, or pain; speaking up for what’s right even if there’s opposition; acting on convictions even if unpopular; includes physical bravery but is not limited to it.

items.label: Love
items.sub_label: Valuing close relations with others, in particular those in which sharing & caring are reciprocated; being close to people.

items.label: Prudence
items.sub_label: Being careful about one's choices; not taking undue risks; not saying or doing things that might later be regretted.

items.label: Teamwork
items.sub_label: Working well as a member of a group or team; being loyal to the group; doing one's share.

items.label: Creativity
items.sub_label: Thinking of novel and productive ways to conceptualize and do things; includes artistic achievement but is not limited to it.
